name: [ multiply ]
description:
Gamepad Controls only for now! Really sorry about that, I just forgot about it until the end. Hope you still enjoy it. Go Fullscreen, otherwise it messes up the viewport :)

This game is all about multiplying your enemies in a smart way! But be warned! If you are not careful enough, it might just get out of control...

PowerUps:

  • RapidFire - Shoots super fast
  • Shotgun - Adds spread to your shots
  • HP - Adds health (doesn't regenerate)
  • Shield - Adds shield (regenerates between levels)

Credits for music all go to Evan King!
